    • Method Detail

      • createLessonByInstructor

        public Lesson createLessonByInstructor(CognitoUser instructor,
                                       Lesson lesson)

      • registerStudentToLesson

        public Lesson registerStudentToLesson(CognitoUser student,
                                      java.lang.String instructorId,
                                      java.util.Calendar startTime)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Register student to lesson.

        Lessons are always owned by instructor and instructors id is used as hash key in DynamoDB. This is reason why instructorId must be passed.

        Start time is the range key in DynamoDB and it must be unique among lessons of particular instructor.

        Parameters:
        student - an unique id of the student.
        instructorId - an unique id of the instructor.
        startTime - beginning time of the lesson.
        Returns:
        lesson instance to which the student was registered.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if another student is already registered to it.

      • unregisterStudentFromLesson

        public Lesson unregisterStudentFromLesson(java.lang.String studentId,
                                          java.lang.String instructorId,
                                          java.util.Calendar startTime,
                                          boolean force)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Unregister student from lesson.

        Force mode will delete any student from specified lesson and ignore 24h before lesson.

        No force mode will delete student from lesson if this student is actually registered to it.

        Start time is the range key in DynamoDB.

        Parameters:
        studentId - an unique id of the student.
        instructorId - an unique id of the instructor.
        startTime - beginning time of the lesson.
        force - force delete mode.
        Returns:
        lesson instance from which the student was unregistered.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - (no force only) if the lesson specified belongs to another student.

      • deleteLesson

        public Lesson deleteLesson(java.lang.String instructorId,
                           java.util.Calendar startTime)
        Permamently will delete lesson from the system.
        Parameters:
        instructorId - an unique id of the instructor.
        startTime - startTime which is unique across instructors lessons.
